about_the_game:
HEROIC JOURNEY

Every inch of your journey must be fought for, with allies by your side. You will not survive long alone - cooperation is king in this multiplayer adventure!

KEEP IT SAFE

Be the Beacon in the Dark! This isn't just cargo; it's a flickering ember of hope in the desolate unknown. Guide it, shield it, and illuminate the path forward! Every step with this precious burden brings you closer to the next haven. Become the guardian of light, and lead your allies to safety!

HANDCRAFTED, PIXEL-PERFECT REALM

Lovingly created pixel-art brings the world to life. Delve into the creepy Thilliath Forest, the cult-infested wastes of the fallen Rosemarble Empire, or the harsh frozen tundra of the Korvathi Mountains, with equally varied enemies, inhabitants and events to encounter.

DISCOVER YOUR OWN PATH

Create a unique character, choosing from four species and four classes and customizing your appearance, backstory and traits.

Characters of identical race and class have distinct skill trees! Unravel your character's own potential as you progress. Shape legends that defy convention.

UNEARTH LEGENDS

Explore perilous dungeons and forgotten ruins to encounter unique legendary weapons, armor, and artifacts. Become the master of this arsenal and conquer the most formidable foes. Every piece whispers of forgotten victories – will you write the next chapter?

---

Message from the developer:
Thank you for checking out my game! I have been working on this unique experience for 4 years now, and I will not quit until it is ready to blow your mind!!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP or later
  • Processor: Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 256 MB graphics memory and directx 9.0c compatible gpu
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Discrete GPU capable of directx 9.0c
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Bravest Burden is an online cooperative RPG with real-time combat. Learn to journey as a fellowship with a heavy burden, or be torn apart by a devastated world. Create your characters and travel the realm together. Choose how your character fits into this dark world!
